name: Oinky's
description:
Back to work! You’re a recently hired part-time employee at America’s favorite pig-themed restaurant, Oinky’s. Maintain enough mental health to get through your shifts (without getting caught eating out of the trash too many times) and win a semblance of self-respect in this action-packed digital card game.

Credits

Programming + Game Design: Cody Selman (twitch) 

Art Direction + Illustration: Weston Mansfield @slikhog

Sound Design + Music: Jeff Alvarez

Writing + Video: Jenna Dousi @bugdeal

Additional Game Design: Alex Marotto

Additional Illustration: Marina Frecaut  @lolitaviolence
